casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Edwin Wayne JOYCE. No. 194P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2004 by Defendant for Disqualifying Judge:

*29

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of March 2004."
